source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(LastModifytime) as NewWatermarkvalue from customer_table

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from customer_table where LastModifytime > '@{activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and LastModifytime <= '@{activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CloudsalesCustomers
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp,
		UpdatedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CloudsalesAddresses
CloudsalesCustomers derive(SourceID = 1,
		SourceSystemCustomerID = concat('1',CustomerID)) ~> NewColsAddedCloudsales
CloudsalesAddresses derive(SourceID = 1,
		GlobalCustomerID = concat('1',CustomerID,AddressID)) ~> NewColsAddedCloudsalesAddr
NewColsAddedCloudsales, NewColsAddedCloudsalesAddr join(CloudsalesCustomers@CustomerID == CloudsalesAddresses@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> CloudsalesCustomerAddr
CloudsalesCustomerAddr derive(CustomerCreatedDate = iif(CloudsalesCustomers@CreatedDate>CloudsalesAddresses@CreatedDate,CloudsalesCustomers@CreatedDate,CloudsalesAddresses@CreatedDate),
		CustomerUpdatedDate = iif(CloudsalesCustomers@UpdatedDate>CloudsalesAddresses@UpdatedDate,CloudsalesCustomers@UpdatedDate,CloudsalesAddresses@UpdatedDate )) ~> DateColumns
DateColumns select(mapColumn(
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		PhoneNumber,
		SourceSystemCustomerID,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		SourceSystemIdID = NewColsAddedCloudsalesAddr@SourceID,
		GlobalCustomerID,
		CustomerCreatedDate,
		CustomerUpdatedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> CloudsalesCustomerAddresses
CloudsalesCustomerAddresses sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Customers

source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		ShipDate as string,
		TotalCost as double,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Orders
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitCost as string,
		LineNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Orderdetail
Orders, Orderdetail join(Orders@OrderID == Orderdetail@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> SalesOrders
SalesOrders select(mapColumn(
		OrderID = Orders@OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		OrderDetailID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SalesOrderConformed
SalesOrderConformed derive(SourceId = 1,
		UniqueOrderID = uuid(),
		UniqueMovieID = concat('1',MovieID),
		UniqueCustomerID = concat('1',CustomerID)) ~> SalesStaging
SalesStaging sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		OrderDetailID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		SourceId,
		UniqueOrderID,
		UniqueMovieID,
		UniqueCustomerID
	)) ~> SalesOrderDetail

source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		StreamStart as timestamp,
		StreamEnd as timestamp,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SouthridgeStreaming
SouthridgeStreaming derive(SourceSystemID = 1,
		GlobalTransactionid = uuid(),
		SourceSystemTransactionID = concat('1',TransactionID),
		UniqueMovieID = concat('1',MovieID),
		UniqueCustomerID = concat('1',CustomerID)) ~> NewColsAdded
NewColsAdded select(mapColumn(
		StreamStart,
		StreamEnd,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalTransactionid,
		SourceSystemTransactionID,
		UniqueMovieID,
		UniqueCustomerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> StreamingConformed
StreamingConformed sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Streaming
